alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 28 at 10:10AM CDT until August 29 at 10:36PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River near Lena affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River near Lena. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 25.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 13.0 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Pearl River Lena 24.0 25.2 Sun 9 am CDT 23.3 19.7 16.2 &&
info.instruction: Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 1015 PM CDT.
